LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeLance.label: urchar (lansa pléascach)
LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeRifle.label: urchar (raidhfil pléascach)
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLance.label: lansa pléascach
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLance.description: Tá an lansa seo luchtaithe le cumhacht pléascach. Scaoileann sé urchar aonair ar ardluas.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLance.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLance.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: lansa pléascach
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.label: raidhfil pléascach
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.description: Tá an raidhfil seo luchtaithe le cumhacht pléascach. Bíonn gach urchar a scaoileann sé cumhachtaithe le fuinneamh pléascach, rud a chuireann go mór leis an damáiste a dhéanann an t-arm seo.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.tools.stock.label: stoc
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.tools.barrel.label: bairille
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: raidhfil pléascach
